dialog: Minister Carter has dispatched me to extend an invitation to attend a feast in your honor at the Shangri-La Hotel, commencing at 7 PM this eve. Please allow me to present you with this invitation.
How gracious of him. I would be honored to attend. At what hour would you like me to be ready?
If you could have yourself prepared by 6:30 PM, I shall be waiting at the hotel to escort you.
That is wonderful news. Your thoughtfulness is greatly appreciated, Miss Rose.
It is my pleasure. Farewell for now.
Farewell until this evening, Miss Rose.
I desire an audience with Dr. Johnson.
Pardon me, but he is not present at the moment. May I assist you by taking a message?
This is Robert Jordan. Kindly request him to return my call, if you would be so kind.
Very well, I shall deliver the message.
Good day, sir. Might I have a glance at your passport?
Certainly, here you are.
Many thanks. Do these belong to you?
No, a portion of them belongs to my companion. Would you like me to present her passport as well?
Indeed, please do. Do you have any hand-carried items?
Shall I place them on the conveyor belt as well?
Yes, if you would be so kind. Could you open this large suitcase for me?
Very well. Just a moment. It contains nothing more than some garments and grooming supplies.
Understood. Do you have anything to declare?
I do not believe so.
